abstract: Northern part of Yemen's capital city of Sana has turned into a virtual war zone as antigovernment protests continue, despite the government's announcement of a cease-fire; failure to end the bloodshed is another sign that fighting has intensified between then nation's heavily armed elite groups of tribesmen.
snippet: Explosions boomed across the capital city of Sana as mostly peaceful antigovernment protests continued.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Explosions boomed across the capital city of Sana as mostly peaceful antigovernment protests continued.

headline.main: Yemen’s Embattled Government Calls Cease-Fire That So Far Fails to End Violence
headline.print_headline: Yemen’s Embattled Government Calls Cease-Fire That So Far Fails to End Violence
headline.seo: Yemen Cease-Fire Fails to End Violence
